mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.bio, u.avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_follow WHERE user_id = u.id AND is_del = 0) AS follow_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_follow WHERE followed_user_id = u.id AND is_del = 0) AS fans_count, EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user_follow WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND followed_user_id = u.id AND is_del = 0) AS following FROM user u WHERE u.id = #{userId};

SELECT u.id, u.username, u.bio, u.avatar, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_follow WHERE user_id = u.id AND is_del = 0) AS follow_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_follow WHERE followed_user_id = u.id AND is_del = 0) AS fans_count, EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM user_follow WHERE user_id = IFNULL(#{userId}, 0) AND followed_user_id = u.id AND is_del = 0) AS following FROM user u left join article as a on a.author_id = u.id where a.id = #{articleId};
